lead_paragraph: HOWE--Margaret (Peggy) Burke, died May 15, 2016, at her home in Essex, CT in the company of her children. Margaret was born May 25, 1922, to Elizabeth and John Woolfolk Burke M.D., of Washington, D.C., and was the last surviving child of four. She was married to Arthur Howe Jr. for over 70 years until his death in December 2014. She leaves her four surviving children, Margaret Howe Emmons, of Yarmouth, ME, Samuel A. Howe, of Andover, MA, Arthur Howe, III, of South Portland, ME, and Thomas A. Howe, of Gilmanton, NH. A memorial service will be held at 3:00pm on Saturday, June 11, 2016, at the First Congregational Church of Old Lyme, 2 Ferry Rd., Old Lyme, CT, 06371. Donations in her memory may be made to the Community Music School, PO Box 387, Centerbrook,, CT 06409, or to AFS Intercultural Programs (AFS Archives for Arthur Howe Jr.) 71 W. 23rd St., New York, NY. 10010 1/3
